meanings.definition: A type of phenol compound found in creosote.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the creosols in the creosote to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The creosols in the creosote gave it a distinct smell.
meanings.sent3: The creosols in the creosote decided to have a party to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The creosols in the creosote whispered secrets to each other in the dark.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the creosols in the creosote sparkled like tiny gems.

meanings.sent1: The barrel contained various creosols waiting to be used in the project.
meanings.sent2: The creosols were carefully measured before being mixed together.
meanings.sent3: The creosols gathered around the campfire, sharing stories of their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The creosols stood out in the crowd, each with its own distinct personality.
meanings.sent5: The creosols danced in harmony, creating a beautiful symphony of scents.
